                                                                   throws java.lang.Exception
This function is used for filtering orders based on a stage/filter

Parameters:
number - The customers phone number
filter - The string that is being looked for
Returns:
An ArrayList of orders that have been found with the filter.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - Throws an Exception if no matching orders are found.

Parameters:
